How many people are affected by piebaldism ?,The prevalence of piebaldism is unknown.,GHR,piebaldism
What are the genetic changes related to piebaldism ?,"Piebaldism can be caused by mutations in the KIT and SNAI2 genes. Piebaldism may also be a feature of other conditions, suc
